title: Sesame street show No.1. Part one
brief_description: Part of the famous television series for children which was evolved after months of research and planning. The series uses a mixture of puppets, film segments and animated cartoons, together with `on set’ live characters, all presented in segments short enough to be within the interest span of pre-school children.
